content: the pint sized pumpkin is a tiny crocheted pumpkin with a little smiling face it was the first of 12 halloween themed mini amigurumi included in the fall mini amigurumi crochet along on 5 little monsters the pattern can be found free on 5littlemonsters com as well as for purchase in an ad-free pdf version in the mini amigurumi halloween ebook containing all 12 halloween mini amigurumi patterns from the crochet along
